      • getUpdateSeaCreaturesPacketFromServer

        public java.util.ArrayList<Fish> getUpdateSeaCreaturesPacketFromServer()
        Actually makes the request for new SeaCreatures from the server and sends a new ClientSubOceanSeaCreatureStatePacket so that the server can no what to send, listens for SeaCreatures sent from server and returns any
        Returns:
        The SeaCreatures sent by the server

      • addFishPacketToScreen

        public void addFishPacketToScreen(java.util.ArrayList<Fish> fishUpdate,
                                  int topOffset,
                                  int bottomOffset,
                                  javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Adds fish to the screen between the topOffset and bottomOffset and of the given color
        Parameters:
        fishUpdate - the fish to add to the screen
        topOffset - the highest the fish can be on the screen
        bottomOffset - the lowest the fish can be on the screen
        color - the color the fish should be given

      • addFishToScreen

        public void addFishToScreen(Fish fish,

                            javafx.scene.paint.Color color)

        topOffset - the highest the fish can be on the screen
        bottomOffset - the lowest the fish can be on the screen
        color - the color the fish should be given
